attributes.action: make education about the effects of greenhouse gas emission on the environment compulsory for school students.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The need to tackle global warming is becoming more and more evident, and it will fall to future generations to deal with the consequences. Therefore it is imperative to educate the youth of today about the problem and potential solutions, in order for the population to gain a better understanding of the situation.
